import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const RobotDetails = ({ robot }) => { if (!robot) { return
Loading...
; } const { id, name, model, manufacturer, serialNumber, height, mass, status, description } = robot; return (

{robot.name}

ID: {robot.serialNumber}

Model: {robot.model}

Manufacturer: {robot.manufacturer}

Serial Number: {robot.serialNumber}

Status: {robot.status}

Height: {robot.height}

Mass: {robot.mass}

Description: {robot.description}

/*

{name}

{description}

${price} (Free Shipping)
{rating} stars
Back to Robots
*/ ); }; export default RobotDetails;
